text: Jose Ricardo Figueroa (born 10 January 1991) is a Cuban modern pentathlete. He competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro, in the men's event. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Cuban male modern pentathletes Category:Olympic modern pentathletes of Cuba Category:Modern pentathletes at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Modern pentathletes at the 2015 Pan American Games Category:Modern pentathletes at the 2019 Pan American Games Category:Pan American Games medalists in modern pentathlon Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for Cuba
title: Jose Ricardo Figueroa
